# Zensical Prototype Handoff Checklist

Use this checklist before handing prototype work to another reviewer or to a
migration implementation pass.

## Handoff metadata

- Date:
- Owner:
- Branch:
- Last successful preview run:
- Related issue/PR:

## 1) Required artifacts

- [ ] `docs/plan/zensical-prototype-status-dashboard.md` updated
- [ ] `docs/plan/zensical-prototype-preview-log.md` updated
- [ ] Latest review report attached
- [ ] Open items listed with severity

## 2) Validation gates

- [ ] `make docs-check` passes
- [ ] `make docs-site-check` passes
- [ ] Preview workflow run is successful
- [ ] No new broken links in changed pages

## 3) Readiness summary

- Navigation parity: complete/incomplete
- Config parity: complete/incomplete
- Review coverage: complete/incomplete
- Cutover recommendation: yes/no

## 4) Follow-up plan

1.
2.
3.
